price: Mola wetu! Unighufirie mimi na wazazi wangu wote wawili, na Waumini, siku ya kusimama hisabu.
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ
footnotes: Ewe Mola wetu Mlezi! Nisamehe madhambi yaliyo niponyoka, na wasamehe wazazi wangu, na Waumini wote, Siku itapo hakikishwa hisabu, na baadae ikawa malipo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
